PHRASE.LANG: Take on the look of the Greek god of war, Ares. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, sandals and a spear and sword for each of your hands. [#Legal]
Enfilez le costume d'Arès, dieu grec de la guerre. Ce pack comprend un casque, un plastron, une tunique, des sandales ainsi qu'une lance et une épée dans chacune de vos mains. [#Legal]
Kleiden Sie sich wie der griechische Kriegsgott Ares. Im Paket enthalten sind Helm, Ober- und Unterteil und Sandalen, sowie Speer und Schwert für die Hände. [#Legal]
Assumi l'aspetto di Ares, il dio greco della guerra. Il pacchetto include elmo, corazza, tunica, sandali e lancia e spada da tenere in mano. [#Legal]
Adopta el aspecto de Ares, el dios griego de la guerra. El conjunto comprende casco, parte superior, parte inferior, sandalias y una lanza y espada. [#Legal]
그리스 전쟁의 신, 아레스의 모습이 되어 보십시오. 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 샌들, 그리고 각각의 손을 위한 창과 검을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Take on the look of the Greek god of war, Ares. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, sandals and a spear and sword for each of your hands. [#Legal]
裝扮成希臘神話的戰神艾力士。本服裝組包括頭盔、上身、下身、涼鞋、戰矛和劍。 [#Legal]
裝扮成希臘神話的戰神艾力士。本服裝組包括頭盔、上半身、下半身、涼鞋、戰矛和劍。 [#Legal]
Take on the look of the Greek god of war, Ares. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, sandals and a spear and sword for each of your hands. [#Legal]
